def_cn: 议员；（尤指）专门委员会议员
def_en: Parliamentarians are Members of a Parliament; used especially to refer to a group of Members of Parliament who are dealing with a particular task.

def_cn: （精通议会议事规则和程序并积极参与辩论的）资深议员
def_en: A parliamentarian is a Member of Parliament who is an expert on the rules and procedures of Parliament and takes an active part in debates.
